name: The Stick of Many Things
description:
You've got a stick and the sudden urge to exit your car and enter the forest, what will you find as you push deeper?

CONTROLS:

Move: [W][A][S][D]

Jump: [SPACE]

Attack: [LEFT MOUSE]

Zoom: [RIGHT MOUSE]

Known issues:

- Flying/no-clip AI (hey maybe its a feature?)

- Settings menu has mostly dud buttons
